xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity output="false"}} ## Use XWikiAllGroup as the group target. #set($groupDoc = $xwiki.getDocument('XWiki.XWikiAllGroup')) #macro(hasGroupRight $right $hasGroupRight) #set($result = $xwiki.hasAccessLevel($right, $xcontext.user, $groupDoc.fullName) && $groupDoc.getObject('XWiki.XWikiGroups', false)) #set($hasGroupRight = $NULL) #setVariable("$hasGroupRight" $result) #end #hasGroupRight('edit' $hasEditGroupRight) #hasGroupRight('delete' $hasDeleteGroupRight) {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} #set ($candidateClass = 'WorkspaceCandidateMemberClass') #set ($xwikiGroupsClass = 'XWiki.XWikiGroups') #set ($messageStream = $services.messageStream) #set ($wikiDescriptor = $services.workspace.getWorkspace($xcontext.database).wikiDescriptor) #set ($workspacePrettyName = $wikiDescriptor.wikiPrettyName) #if ("$!workspacePrettyName" == '') #set ($workspacePrettyName = $xcontext.database) #end #set ($workspaceUrl = $wikiDescriptor.homePageUrl) ## #if ($hasAdmin && ($request.acceptUser || $request.rejectUser)) ## Handle a candidate members's request. ## #set ($candidateNumber = $mathtool.toInteger("$!{request.candidateNumber}")) #set ($candidateMember = $groupDoc.getObject($candidateClass, $candidateNumber)) #if ($candidateMember && $candidateMember.getProperty('status').getValue() == 'pending') ## Common values. #set ($temp = $candidateMember.set('reviewer', "$xcontext.user")) #set ($temp = $candidateMember.set('resolutionDate', $datetool.date)) #set ($temp = $candidateMember.set('reviewerComment', "$!{request.reviewerComment}")) #set ($temp = $candidateMember.set('reviewerPrivateComment', "$!{request.reviewerPrivateComment}")) ## Specific values. #if ($request.acceptUser) #set ($temp = $candidateMember.set('status', 'accepted')) ## Add user to group, if not already added, and notify user. #set ($existingUserObject = $groupDoc.getObject($xwikiGroupsClass, 'member', $candidateMember.userName)) #if (!$existingUserObject) #set ($newUserObject = $groupDoc.newObject($xwikiGroupsClass)) #set ($temp = $newUserObject.set('member', $candidateMember.userName)) #end #set ($notificationMessage = $services.localization.render('platform.workspace.joinRequestAcceptedNotification', [$workspacePrettyName])) #elseif ($request.rejectUser) #set ($temp = $candidateMember.set('status', 'rejected')) #set ($notificationMessage = $services.localization.render('platform.workspace.joinRequestRejectedNotification', [$workspacePrettyName])) #end ## Save changes. #set ($temp = $groupDoc.save($services.localization.render('platform.workspace.candidateHandledSaveComment', [$candidateNumber, $candidateMember.userName]), true)) ## Notify the user. #if ("$!{request.reviewerComment}" != '') ## FIXME: replace newline with ${escapetool.newline} when upgrading velocity-tools to 2.0 (in xwiki3.1+?) #set ($notificationMessage = "${notificationMessage} $services.localization.render('platform.workspace.candidateHandledComment') ${request.reviewerComment}") #end #set ($userDocumentReference = $services.model.resolveDocument($candidateMember.userName)) #set ($temp = $messageStream.postDirectMessageToUser($notificationMessage, $userDocumentReference)) #if ($request.acceptUser) {{info}}{{translation key="platform.workspace.candidateAcceptedSuccess"/}}{{/info}} #else {{info}}{{translation key="platform.workspace.candidateRejectedSuccess"/}}{{/info}} #end #end #elseif($hasAdmin && $request.inviteUser) ## Handle inviting users. ## #set ($names = []) #set ($namesArray = $request.getParameterValues('name')) #set ($discard = $names.addAll($namesArray.subList(0, $namesArray.size()))) #set ($discard = $names.removeAll([''])) #set ($message = $request.message) ## ## Remove users that are already members. #set ($alreadyMembers = []) #foreach ($name in $names) #if ($groupDoc.getObject($xwikiGroupsClass, 'member', $name)) #set ($discard = $alreadyMembers.add($name)) {{error}}$services.localization.render('platform.workspace.inviteUserAlreadyMember', [$xwiki.getUserName($name, false)]){{/error}} #end #end #set ($discard = $names.removeAll($alreadyMembers)) ## ## Remove users that have already been invited. #set ($alreadyInvited = []) #foreach ($name in $names) #foreach ($candidateMember in $groupDoc.getObjects($candidateClass, 'userName', $name)) #if ($candidateMember.getProperty('status').getValue() == 'pending') #set ($errorMessageKey = 'platform.workspace.inviteUserAlreadyInvited') #if ($candidateMember.getProperty('type').getValue() == 'request') #set ($errorMessageKey = 'platform.workspace.inviteRequestAlreadyExists') #end {{error}}$services.localization.render($errorMessageKey, [$xwiki.getUserName($name, false)]){{/error}} #set ($discard = $alreadyInvited.add($name)) #break #end #end #end #set ($discard = $names.removeAll($alreadyInvited)) ## #foreach ($userName in $names) #set ($newInvitationObject = $groupDoc.newObject($candidateClass)) #set ($temp = $newInvitationObject.set('status', 'pending')) #set ($temp = $newInvitationObject.set('type', 'invitation')) #set ($temp = $newInvitationObject.set('reviewer', "$xcontext.user")) #set ($temp = $newInvitationObject.set('resolutionDate', $datetool.date)) #set ($temp = $newInvitationObject.set('reviewerComment', "$!message")) #set ($temp = $newInvitationObject.set('userName', $userName)) ##set ($temp = $newInvitationObject.set('reviewerPrivateComment', "$!{request.reviewerPrivateComment}")) ## Save the invitation. #set ($temp = $groupDoc.save($services.localization.render('platform.workspace.inviteSaveComment', [$userName]), true)) ## Notify the user. #set ($notificationMessage = $services.localization.render('platform.workspace.inviteNotification', [$workspacePrettyName])) #if ("$!message" != '') ## FIXME: remplace newline with ${escapetool.newline} when upgrading velocity-tools to 2.0 (in xwiki3.1+?) #set ($notificationMessage = "$notificationMessage $services.localization.render('platform.workspace.candidateHandledComment') $message") #end #set ($userDocumentReference = $services.model.resolveDocument($userName)) #set ($temp = $messageStream.postDirectMessageToUser($notificationMessage, $userDocumentReference)) {{info}}$services.localization.render('platform.workspace.inviteSuccess', [$xwiki.getUserName($userName, false)]){{/info}} #end #elseif ($hasAdmin && $request.cancelInvitation) ## ## Handle cancelling an invitation. #set ($candidateNumber = $mathtool.toInteger("$!{request.candidateNumber}")) #set ($candidateMember = $groupDoc.getObject($candidateClass, $candidateNumber)) #if ($candidateMember && $candidateMember.getProperty('status').getValue() == 'pending') ## Remove the invitation #set ($temp = $groupDoc.removeObject($candidateMember)) ## Save changes. #set ($temp = $groupDoc.save($services.localization.render('platform.workspace.invitationCancelSaveComment', [$candidateNumber, $candidateMember.userName]), true)) ## Notify the user. #set ($notificationMessage = $services.localization.render('platform.workspace.invitationCancelNotification')) #set ($userDocumentReference = $services.model.resolveDocument($candidateMember.userName)) #set ($temp = $messageStream.postDirectMessageToUser($notificationMessage, $userDocumentReference)) {{info}}{{translation key="platform.workspace.invitationCancelSuccess"/}}{{/info}} #end #end ## ## In the original sheet, this was displayed only in edit mode. #if($hasEditGroupRight) {{html}} #userPicker_import() #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.WorkspaceUsers')) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.WorkspaceUsers'))
